name: Snow Fight 3D!
description:
Hello!

I made a game about snowball fighting against evil snowmen for solo winter game jam in 72 hours fully from scratch! I was thinking about Club Penguin as inspiration here. I had to rush a lot of the things but I think the idea is still well represented. Although the Art is largely incomplete the blockout is there and I guess it ended up having a little bit of a retro feel.

I strongly recommend using a controller as the game was designed with this.

The gameplay is very short but I hope that you enjoy what there is. Let me know what you think; if you'd like me to continue the project or some bugs to fix. I can also upload executables for windows and mac if the web browser lags…

Thanks for playing!
